archimate:Product.name: SpaCy
archimate:Product.documentation: https://spacy.io/ Features: Support for 64+ languages 55 trained pipelines for 17 languages Multi-task learning with pretrained transformers like BERT Pretrained word vectors State-of-the-art speed Production-ready training system Linguistically-motivated tokenization Components for named entity recognition, part-of-speech tagging, dependency parsing, sentence segmentation, text classification, lemmatization, morphological analysis, entity linking and more Easily extensible with custom components and attributes Support for custom models in PyTorch, TensorFlow and other frameworks Built in visualizers for syntax and NER Easy model packaging, deployment and workflow management Robust, rigorously evaluated accuracy
